summary: Upload non-image files, such as PDF or video to TikTok Shop
description:
Upload non-image files, such as PDF or video to TikTok Shop.  Use this API when you need to add videos to your product to improve the shopping experience, or submit certifications or reports to meet TikTok Shop requirements for listing restricted products.  Note: You must store the response body to retrieve the ID or URL required to associate the file with a product during product creation or editing. Version
202309
  
API Testing Tool

query.description: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.
Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.
Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

header.description: The seller access_token value from Get Access Token, when user_type = 0. Follow this guide to get seller access_token.

body.description: The local file to be uploaded.  Note： - Supported formats: PDF, MP4, MOV, MKV, WMV, WEBM, AVI, 3GP, FLV, MPEG - Max file size: 10MB - Video aspect ratio: 9:16 to 16:9  Recommendations for product videos: - Aspect ratio: 1:1  - Resolution: HD 720p or higher - Duration: 20 - 60 seconds

The name of the file, including the file extension (e.g. certification.pdf)  Note: - Do not use additional periods, except the one preceding the file extension. - Do not begin the name with symbols. - Do not include spaces.

schema.description: The success or failure status code returned in API response.
The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

children.description: The file ID generated by TikTok Shop. Pass this value when creating or editing a product to associate the file with the product.
The URL to access and view the file.
The format of the file. Possible values: PDF, MP4, MOV, MKV, WMV, WEBM, AVI, 3GP, FLV, MPEG

error_codes.message: Couldn't upload file, the file is empty.
Failed to process the file. The format or content is not supported.
The video ratio must be between 9:16 and 16:9.
Couldn't upload image, the image is blank.
Failed to process the image. The format or content is not supported.
The file size exceeds the maximum allowed size.
